attributes.action: replace God Save the Queen with Icky Ficky by Lawnmower Deth as British national anthem.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: God Save The Queen no longer has any relevance to today's british society. Reffering to an outdated pseudo-feudal system, christian belief system and  over-ambitious and offensive imperial expansion. We, the undersigned, feel that Icky Ficky is a far more accurate portrayal of the overall character of the nation.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
